scripts.build: cd backend && yarn build && cd ../client && yarn build && cd .. && yarn oas:generate:typescript && cd oas-client-ts && yarn build
scripts.install: cd client && yarn install && cd ../backend && yarn install && cd ../oas-client-ts && yarn install
scripts.oas:generate:typescript: export JAVA_OPTS='-DmaxYamlCodePoints=99999999' && openapi-generator generate -i ./crud.yaml -g typescript-axios -t ~/github/openapi-generator/modules/openapi-generator/src/main/resources/typescript-axios --additional-properties=supportsES6=false -o oas-client-ts/generated --skip-operation-example --skip-validate-spec
scripts.oas:generate:java: export JAVA_OPTS='-DmaxYamlCodePoints=99999999' && openapi-generator generate -i ./crud.yaml -g java -t ~/github/openapi-generator/modules/openapi-generator/src/main/resources/Java -o oas-client-java/client/generated --skip-operation-example --skip-validate-spec
scripts.oas:generate:python: export JAVA_OPTS='-DmaxYamlCodePoints=99999999' && openapi-generator generate -i ./crud.yaml -g python -t ~/github/openapi-generator/modules/openapi-generator/src/main/resources/python --additional-properties=pydanticV2=true -o oas-client-python/clients/generated --skip-operation-example --skip-validate-spec
